O

option_gia(Database) - Static method in class de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02.CommandLineInterface
Retrieve an image from the database by author with the Database.get_byteImage(String, String, String) and save as .png file with the specified path by the user.
option_git(Database) - Static method in class de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02.CommandLineInterface
Retrieve an image from the database by title and save as .png file.
option_gma(Database) - Static method in class de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02.CommandLineInterface
Get metadata by author and save as .txt file
option_gmt(Database) - Static method in class de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02.CommandLineInterface
Get metadata by title and save as .txt file
option_p(Database) - Static method in class de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02.CommandLineInterface
Print the contents of the database
option_s(Database) - Static method in class de.bit.pl02.pp5.task02.CommandLineInterface
Creates a database with the method Database.make_table(), reads the files of the specified directory and inserts the metadata of ID, TITLE and AUTHOR into the database with the method Database.read_director(String).
